Subject: RE: Leakage Case - Lacoste Bcc

 

Dear Team,

 

Hope this email finds you all well!

 

We would like to extend our sincere thanks to @Zainab Alqadhi <mailto:Zainab.Alqadhi@chalhoub.com>  @Fadhel Alaali <mailto:Fadhel.Alaali@chalhoub.com>  @Maribel Derla <mailto:Maribel.Derla@chalhoub.com>  and the team for their cooperation in resolving the water leakage issue and restoring operations at the boutique in such a short time.

 

This truly reflects the strength of teamwork, and the expertise demonstrated in handling the situation effectively.

We would like to extend our sincere thanks to @Zainab Alqadhi <mailto:Zainab.Alqadhi@chalhoub.com>  @Fadhel Alaali <mailto:Fadhel.Alaali@chalhoub.com>  @Maribel Derla <mailto:Maribel.Derla@chalhoub.com>  and the team for their cooperation in resolving the water leakage issue and restoring operations at the boutique in such a short time.

 

This truly reflects the strength of teamwork, and the expertise demonstrated in handling the situation effectively.

 

Our team member as well handled the situation effectively by promptly removing the nearby items, which limited the impact to only two pieces as attached.

 

@Yasser Osama <mailto:Yasser.Osama@chalhoub.com>  Could assist further in case of additional details required to claim the damages.

 

 

Best Regards,

 

ALI YUSUF YUSUF

STORE MANAGER

CHALHOUB & BUHINDI CO. W.L.L.

MANAMA

From: Fadhel Alaali <Fadhel.Alaali@chalhoub.com <mailto:Fadhel.Alaali@chalhoub.com> >
Sent: Wednesday, May 14, 2025 10:28:20 AM
To: Husain Ali ALMUHANDES <Husain.Almuhandes@chalhoub.com <mailto:Husain.Almuhandes@chalhoub.com> >
Cc: Lacoste BCC <Lacoste.BCC@chalhoub.com <mailto:Lacoste.BCC@chalhoub.com> >; Ali Yusuf Yusuf <Ali.Yusuf@chalhoub.com <mailto:Ali.Yusuf@chalhoub.com> >; Shereen Omar <Shereen.Omar@chalhoub.com <mailto:Shereen.Omar@chalhoub.com> >; Zainab Alqadhi <Zainab.Alqadhi@chalhoub.com <mailto:Zainab.Alqadhi@chalhoub.com> >; Maribel Derla <Maribel.Derla@chalhoub.com <mailto:Maribel.Derla@chalhoub.com> >; Lamees Qasem <Lamees.Qasem@chalhoub.com <mailto:Lamees.Qasem@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: Leakage Case - Lacoste Bcc 

 

Dear Husain, 

Good morning.

 

Please be informed that we have received a called from Lacoste team today 14.05.2025 at 8:56AM regarding a leakage they faced since they entered the store. We assigned the maintenance team to reactivate the leakage. But we found out that the issue from the chiller pipes sensor which is related to the mall not the store.

Please be informed that we have received a called from Lacoste team today 14.05.2025 at 8:56AM regarding a leakage they faced since they entered the store. We assigned the maintenance team to reactivate the leakage. But we found out that the issue from the chiller pipes sensor which is related to the mall not the store. 

However, I'm currently in the location and following up with them to resolve this issue. So, currently the store will be closed for approximately 3-4 hours. The mall got informed also. 

 

Attached for your reference. 

 

Thank you. 

Best regards,

FADHEL ALAALI

TECHNICAL SUPERVISOR ‑ FACILITY MANAGEMENT

CHALHOUB & BUHINDI CO. W.L.L.

MANAMA

‑

BAHRAIN
